Bolt of Genius.name: Bolt of Genius
Bolt of Genius.flavor: You share a moment of brilliant clarity with a close comrade.
Bolt of Genius.effect: The target regains the use of an encounter attack power that he or she has already used during this encounter.

Force Retreat.name: Force Retreat
Force Retreat.flavor: You hurl yourself into your adversary, knocking him back into his allies and causing them all to stumble away from you.
Force Retreat.onHit: 1[W] damage, and you push the target a number of squares up to your Intelligence modifier. Make the secondary attack.
Force Retreat.secondaryTarget: Each enemy that was adjacent to the primary target before the push, is its size or smaller, and is within your melee reach
Force Retreat.secondaryOnHit: 2d6 + Strength modifier damage, and you can push the secondary target 1 square.

Cunning Flurry.name: Cunning Flurry
Cunning Flurry.flavor: You whirl around like a cyclone of steel terror, slashing at foes. With each landed blow, you knock your enemy prone or send it stumbling backward.
Cunning Flurry.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Cunning Flurry.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you either push the target 1 square or knock it prone.
